hooks.command: input=$(cat); transcript=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.transcript_path'); msg=$(tail -20 "$transcript" | grep '"type":"assistant"' | tail -1 | jq -r '.message.content[] | select(.type=="text") | .text' 2>/dev/null | head -c 200); [ -z "$msg" ] && msg='Task finished'; terminal-notifier -title 'Claude Code' -message "$msg" -sound Pop -activate com.apple.Terminal
terminal-notifier -title 'Claude Code' -message 'Needs your input' -sound Ping -activate com.apple.Terminal
